attributes.action: FCA must investigate crimes against Quindell PLC
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure that the Financial Conduct Authority Investigate multiple allegations of serious market abuse and corruption by racketeers led by activist hedge funds who have sought to destroy Quindell PLC for profit.
1. Cost hundreds of millions to the UK economy
2. Jobs Lost
3. Millions lost in Tax
Please help stamp out fraud make them pay Quindell and the exchequer for the loss.
